page.title: 16MY LIFE 2
page.content: Today people wear anything they want because there isn't a particular fashion at the moment. A lot of people wear jeans which are a kind of very tight trouser made out of a material called denim. Very short skirts known as Mini-skirts are also worn. The shoes which are in fashion are very pointed and have a stiletto heel which comes down to a small metal tip about seven millimetres in diameter. Short hair is fashionable now although, like clothes, people wear it in any style. Some people dye their hair and make it stick up with a gel. This is called Mohican style after some Red Indians. Lots of people have their ears pierced and wear large earrings. A few people have theirs pierced several times and wear six or more studs as well as earrings.
